items.question: What kind of images work best for the Ken Burns effect?
items.answer: High-quality images with interesting subjects and backgrounds yield the best results. Ensure they are clear and well-composed to take full advantage of motion effects.

items.question: Can I customize the motion effects?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can control the zoom level, pan direction, and speed of the Ken Burns effect to create a personalized viewer experience.

items.question: How long does the video rendering take?
items.answer: Rendering typically takes 1-2 minutes per video, allowing you to create multiple animations efficiently.

items.question: Is there a limit to the number of videos I can create?
items.answer: No limits! You can create as many videos as you like, making it easy to produce engaging content for various uses.

items.question: Are there any costs involved?
items.answer: We offer a pay-as-you-go pricing model only charging you for the videos you generate, ensuring flexibility and accessibility.

items.question: Do I need special software to use the Ken Burns effect?
items.answer: No additional software is required! Everything is integrated into the WaveSpeed platform for your convenience.

items.question: Will I maintain rights to the videos I create?
items.answer: Yes! You own full commercial rights to all videos produced, allowing you to use them across any platform or medium.

items.question: What support is available if I run into issues?
items.answer: Comprehensive support is provided through our documentation, videos, and a responsive support team available via email or live chat.
